key_findings.importance: This indicates a potential gap in user knowledge or usability of the system, which can affect user experience and satisfaction.
key_findings.insight: Users may prefer to ask for assistance rather than figuring out a solution on their own
supporting_quotes: I always have to ask my young children how to add a second person to a chat
I don't know I know they know how to do it and it just sometimes it's easier than me figuring out just asking to you

opportunities.opportunity: Improve the user interface and provide clear instructions or tutorials on how to use the system
opportunities.rationale: This would empower users to use the system independently and improve their overall experience

pain_points.frequency: This issue was mentioned multiple times in the session
pain_points.impact: This can lead to frustration and reliance on others for help, which may not always be available
pain_points.issue: Difficulty in using certain features of the system

summary: The user expressed difficulty in using certain features of the system, often relying on their children for help. This indicates a potential gap in user knowledge or usability of the system. There is an opportunity to improve the user interface and provide clear instructions or tutorials to enhance the user experience.

user_needs.context: The user expressed difficulty in adding a second person to a chat and often relies on their children for help
user_needs.need: Easy-to-understand instructions or guidance on how to use the system
